channel.title: Problem..!
channel.description: Not sure, if this is the right section or not, but how do i add an npc, that only talks but doesnt attack or any thing, i got the id's, but i want to know how do i place them, i just learned how to code like a month, ago, so im new, i really need help, thanks! :(

oor_Man”

And i cant log in after that, what do i do?[/quote]

item.title: Problem..!
item.dc:creator: @MladenJ MladenJ
item.description:
@MladenJ wrote:

Kay ill help now =]

First put ur npc id in you’re autospawn.cfg like this

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption

spawn = 795	2907	4571	0	0	0	0	0	0	Ice queen

now to make it say things open up npchandler.java and add this

if (npcs[i].npcType == 795) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = "Pk shop!";
}
}

where it says npctype you put the npc id you have in you’re autospawn.cfg

Read full topic
